footer.description: We, the NEX team, are committed to improving your user experience in the world of cryptocurrencies, as well as increasing the level of understanding of cryptocurrencies and contributing to the development of the community. If you would like to share your thoughts with us, please contact us via email or social media.

list.item_1: Applications are processed automatically - around the clock.
list.item_2: Support service is available on weekdays - from 8:00 to 23:00
list.item_3: Consultations on questions received outside working hours will be provided as quickly as possible.

list.item_1: Online exchange service nex.com - offers favorable rates for the exchange of electronic currencies and not only. We carry out exchanges of Bitcoin, Ethereum, Bitcoin Cash, USDT, TRX, Privat24, MonoBank, VISA/MasterCard and many others. However, these areas of exchange are not limited - we are constantly adding new directions based on the demand of our customers. Also, the exchange service of electronic currencies Nex - offers profitable discount systems for regular customers. For more information, please contact our Support Team. Be sure to take advantage of these opportunities for a more profitable exchange.
list.item_2: The service does not store your payment data, all financial transactions are made on the side of the payment system, which meets all security requirements. In addition to this, we use a 256-bit SSL certificate, which prevents the theft of personal data when transmitted from our site to the acquirer.
list.item_3: The main function of the nex.com. is the exchange, input and output of electronic currencies of various payment systems. Our task is to make it easier for users to conduct any exchange operations with electronic money, to help various Internet resources create effective tools for mutual settlements with customers, to enable representatives of traditional business to pay for their goods and services using electronic money.
